name: Azure* IoT Hub with AMQP
description:
This project template allow you to test the Microsoft* Azure* IoT Hub.
It will read the temperature from the Grove Temperature Sensor then send it to the Azure* IoT Hub.

First steps:
Create an IoT hub following the instruction in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-create-through-portal. 
Create a connection string for a device following the instruction in https://aka.ms/manageiothub.
Run the example and check the results inside your Azure* IoT Hub

* Other names and brands may be claimed as the property of others.

hwreq: Grove Temperature Sensor (GroveTemp) connected to the Grove Base Shield Port A0

service_provider_description: Microsoft's On-demand cloud computing platform for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications and services through a global network of Microsoft-managed data centers.

additional_fields.name: Connection String
additional_fields.description: The device connection string as defined inside your Azure* IoT Hub
